about_the_game:
Step further into the colourful and unique world of Void Sols.

This DLC bundle grants access to the digital artbook of Void Sols as well as a Hero's guide to pair with your journey through the darkness.

Art Book

This art book contains 8 bespoke pieces of key art showing the world of the game as well as insight from the artists behind Void Sols. Find out more about Finite Reflection's design process and why everything is so geometric

Hero's Journal

The Hero's Journal is a fun way to dive into the perspective of a triangle! Find out clues and hints about the game from sketches and artwork to support you on your adventure!

--

The Art Book and Hero's Journal files are found in the following directory:

[STEAM INSTALL DIRECTORY]*/steamapps/common/VoidSols
